sentences.en: A center of symmetry must coincide with the center of mass.
sentences.cn: 对称中心必须与质量中心重合.

sentences.en: He gave great encouragement to his students, especially if their passions happened to coincide with his own.
sentences.cn: 他给予学生莫大的鼓励，尤其是当他们与自己志趣相投时。

sentences.en: He happened to coincide with you on this point.
sentences.cn: 在这一问题上,他与你不谋而合.

sentences.en: In periods heavily influenced by ideology, political loyalties no longer coincide with national boundaries.
sentences.cn: 在受到意识形态巨大影响的时期, 政治上的忠诚,再也不能以国界来划分了.

sentences.en: It is possible that some of these methods coincide with the designer's needs.
sentences.cn: 这些方法中有一些可能满足设计者的需要.

sentences.en: Operation Amazon is timed to coincide with the start of the dry season.
sentences.cn: 拯救亚马孙河的行动安排在了旱季来临之际。

sentences.en: The " optimum " weak form is the one for which the trial and test spaces coincide.
sentences.cn: “ 最优 ” 的弱解是在测试空间和试验空间重合时得出的.

sentences.en: The interests of the US and those of the islanders may not coincide.
sentences.cn: 美国的利益和这些岛民的利益可能并不一致。

sentences.en: The journalist's interest in a scoop and the source's self - interest coincide.
sentences.cn: 新闻工作者抢登内幕新闻的兴趣和消息来源的自身利益一致.

sentences.en: The kids' views on life don't always coincide, but they're not afraid of voicing their opinions.
sentences.cn: 孩子们的人生观并不总是一致，但他们敢于表达自己的观点。

sentences.en: The reflection points for the transformed waves do not coincide with those of the non - transformed waves.
sentences.cn: 转换波的反射点与 非 转换波的反射点不一致.

sentences.en: These two lines coincide with each other.
These vertices, however, may not be distinct, as in the case where the endpoints may coincide.
sentences.cn: 但这两个顶点不一定是不相同的, 譬如在两个端点重合时的情况.

sentences.en: When our vacations coincided, we often holidayed together.
sentences.cn: 我们的假期要是凑巧赶在一起，我们常常会一同去度假。

sentences.en: Where a trough and crest coincide we get the total amplitude zero.
sentences.cn: 在波峰与波谷重合之处,总振幅实际上为零.

words.tran_cn: 一致的；符合的；同时发生的
巧合的；符合的；暗合的；一致的

trans.tran_en: to happen at the same time as something else, especially by chance

trans.tran_cn: 同时发生； 相符， 相一致； 位置重合， 重叠
trans.tran_en: to happen at the same time as something else, especially by chance
